w: is not subject to anyone’s judgment
you were not yet ready [for solid food]
at the end [ of the procession ]
and I have already pronounced judgment
it were sacrificed to an idol
[while it is] treading out the grain
I do not preach the gospel
we [ do it for a crown ]
We should not commit sexual immorality
Do not become a stumbling block
she should have her hair cut off
I have no praise to offer
we would not come under judgment
you are out of your minds
